items.content_html: Line-Events is a lightweight and straightforward library that operates based on the Observable pattern. It is designed to provide a simple and efficient alternative for creating Observables in JavaScript and TypeScript applications.

items.content_html: tic-title-toggle is a lightweight module that changes the document title when the page visibility changes (e.g., switching browser tabs). Customize with multiple titles and intervals. Perfect for drawing attention when users return to the tab. Easy to integrate into any web project.
items.title: Todointerconectado/tic-title-toggle: tic-title-toggle is a lightweight module that changes the document title when the page visibility changes (e.g., switching browser tabs). Customize with multiple titles and intervals. Perfect for drawing attention when users return to the tab. Easy to integrate into any web project.

items.content_html: A lightweight and customizable starter kit for building TypeScript libraries. It comes with ESM support, flexible configuration options, extensive ESLint rules, and built-in Github Actions integration.

items.content_html: 🏠 A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware.
items.title: jens-maus/RaspberryMatic: :house: A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware.
